txt.en: DNT - 'Bless me, the scent you carry into this camp could shear the beard off Durin himself.'
DNT - 'Bless me, the scent you carry into this camp could shear the beard off Durin himself.'
'Bless me, the stench you carry could shear the beard off Durin himself.'
DNT - Collected a sample for Amma
Mother Amma is in Bazanmanar in north-eastern Clovengap.\n\nYou should let Mother Amma know you have taken care of the crystals.
Caches of corrupted crystals can be found in central Clovengap.\n\nYou should destroy any caches of sarrowstone crystals you come across.
DNT - Collect a sample for Amma

'Most of the journal makes little sense, but this page here mentions a stash ofâ€¦ hmm, they must have no word for what he was trying to say. Stench rock? Oh, this phrase means something to you?\n\n'Go on then, do what you need with your rocks, and give me some time to translate the rest of these ramblings.'
Caches of foul-smelling crystals have been hidden in the overgrown forests of Clovengap.
